For sale:

1909 Obak Jimmy Wiggs (horizontal)  $140 -- SOLD

As you can see from the closeup scan (the 3rd scan), it has a few spots of paper loss on the front:  One just below the ball, one on his lip, and a couple by his shoulder.  Also some spots of paper loss on back.  Card also has some creases.

my email:  [url]boboinnes33@gmail.com[/url]
